summary: AN ORDINANCE regulating newsstands in public places; adding new sections designated Sections 19-A, 19-B, 19-C, 19-D, 19-E, 19-F, 19-G, 19-H and 19-I to Ordinance 90047 to impose certain requirements, establish various standards implemented through a permit system, and confer certain regulatory powers upon the Board of Public Works; and amending Section 6 and repealing Section 22-A of said Ordinance 90047.
